page.title: 11RAASAY'S HEALTH SERVICE
page.content: THE NURSE ON RAASAY IS MRS FERGUSON.THERE IS A RELIEF NURSE,WHO COMES WHEN MRS FERGUSON IS ON LEAVE OR IS ILL.A DOCTER COMES ONCE EVERY TWO WEEKSON A WEDENSDAY MORNING WHEN HE COMES HE GOES UP TO THE SURGERY AT THE COTTAGES AND YOU HAVE TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT TO GET TO SEE THE DOCTER.IT IS NOT ALWAYS THE SAME DOCTER WHO COMES TO RAASAY AS THERE ARE SEVERAL IN THE GROUP PRACTICE IN PORTREE. THERE ARE NO HOSPITALS ON RAASAY SO IF THE DOCTOR SAYES YOU SHOULD GO TO HOSPITAL YOU GO TO PORTREE OR BROADFORD HOSPITAL ON SKYE.IF YOU ARE ILL THE NURSE COMES AND SEES YOU OR YOU GO AND SEE HER,SHE TAKES A LOOK AT YOU AND EXAMINES YOU THEN SHE PHONES THE DOCTER TO SEE IF YOU NEED ANY MEDICINE.IF YOU NEED TO GO TO HOSPITAL YOU GO TO PORTREE OR BROADFORD.
